rna_seq_protocol.selection_method: polyA+ selection using Illumina TruSeq protocol

metadata_source.citation: GTEx Consortium (2020). The GTEx Consortium atlas of genetic regulatory effects across human tissues. Science.
metadata_source.notes: GTEx v10 data, originally using GENCODE v39, harmonized to GENCODE v24 and hg38 for this project. RNA-seq libraries were prepared using the Illumina TruSeq protocol.
metadata_source.v10_notes: V10 analysis summary Gencode version: v39 RNA-seq alignment: STAR v2.7.10a Transcript quantification: RSEM v1.3.3 Genotype used for eQTL analysis: WGS

source_race_to_standard_label_map.5: native hawaiian or other pacific islander

extras.value: GTEx v10 RNA-seq Expression Data (Processed by CZI DNA2Cell Pipeline)
Processed GTEx v10 RNA-seq TPM data, harmonized to GENCODE v24/hg38.
